General.Name: Guangdong Guangzhou Daily Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Guangzhou Daily Media Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a newspaper media company in China. The company offers integrated marketing communication services, such as print media advertising, digital media, outdoor media, and other types of advertising services; and creative planning, film and television, exhibition, event execution, and integrated media and marketing, and communication services. It also provides newspaper and commercial printing services; and invests in media and related industries. The company was formerly known as Guangdong China Sunshine Media Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Guangzhou Daily Media Co., Ltd. in July 2012. Guangdong Guangzhou Daily Media Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 368, Yuejiang West Road, Guangzhou, China, 510308
